edu.upenn.cis.pdtb
Interface PDTBRelationList

All Superinterfaces:
javax.swing.tree.MutableTreeNode, PDTBNode, javax.swing.tree.TreeNode
All Known Implementing Classes:
PDTBRelationListImpl
public interface PDTBRelationList
extends PDTBNode

Container for a list of relations. Typically represents an annotation file in its entirety.

Author:
nikhild
